name: Escape the Rakshasa
description:
ESCAPE THE RAKSHASA!

The malevolent rakshasa wants to eat you, child!  Run away and collect oregano so that you can eventually defeat him!  If he catches you, use candy to distract him and escape.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD
  • Collect Candies and Oregano by walking over them
  • In the Fight, press E when the circles overlap

Team:

  • Code: Villads Stigsen, Brian Bartram
  • Art: Bazo Mettinisson
  • Audio: Tomasz Kulisz
  • Design: Everybody
